title: Former Ford CEO on what to expect from auto sales amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Mark Fields, senior advisor at TPG Capital and former CEO at Ford, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss how the auto market is weathering the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Warren Buffett unloads airline stocks, but trader sees opportunity in three other travel names
description: Warren Buffett has exited the airlines, but one trader says there could be pockets of opportunity elsewhere in the travel space.

title: Fiat Chrysler reports wider-than-expected loss on top and bottom lines
description: CNBC's Phil LeBeau reports Fiat Chrysler's latest quarterly earnings results.

title: United Airlines to cut at least 30% of management, administrative jobs
description: White collar job cuts are coming to United Airlines. CNBC's Phil LeBeau reports.

title: Six classic cocktails to make at home — and the stories behind them
description: In 1920, alcohol was famously outlawed in the U.S. Today, we raise our glasses with these six classic drink recipes provided by bars from around the globe.

title: JJ Kinahan on buying travel and leisure in the age of coronavirus
description: JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade, joins "Closing Bell" to discuss markets.

title: Carnival Cruise Line says it will sail again Aug. 1, a week after coronavirus no-sail order due to expire
description: "We are committed to supporting all public health efforts to manage the Covid-19 situation," the company said in a statement.

title: Cramer: Buffett's sale of airline stocks concerns me near term
description: CNBC's Jim Cramer said Monday that legendary investor Warren Buffett gave "no hope near term" in his annual shareholder meeting on Saturday with his sale of airline stocks.

title: US airline stocks tumble after Buffett sells stakes
description: Airline shares were headed for another day of sharp declines, this time after Warren Buffett said Berkshire Hathaway's cashed out of its stakes in the four largest carriers.
